documents.document: @chennanigans @TedTedwin @____andria what is this I'm so confused
@lindawampler @chrissyteigen How the fuck is this an appropriate question to ask someone?? Let alone someone you don't even know!
Every single word of this is perfection https://t.co/CveKxe5JpL
@sez_sez @PINKYFANG https://t.co/zuOlPFnzTJ This is the best I could find.
@sez_sez @PINKYFANG Might be worth flicking them an email about?
@sarahmaydillon DEFINITELY
@SparkNZ @TedTedwin @chennanigans All good Spark! My fault for not checking your website to see if you had an outage.
@TedTedwin @chennanigans Yeah work internet was out as well. I was running round my office like a headless chicken trying to troubleshoot
@GrumpyYetAmusin From what I've read they're live streaming it from the Greens fb page when it's actually underway?
@greencatherine Is there a livestream online? Can't see anything on your fb page.
@omfgwhateveretc Ooh ok, yuck. Did you say anything? So difficult to know what angle to take with stuff like this.
@omfgwhateveretc Where do they volunteer?!
Has your MP condemned the #muslimban? If not, email them. Silence is complicity. https://t.co/g7X9kiGtAj
Just emailed Bill English about #muslimban and #DoubleTheQuota . You should too.
@thomas_violence Keep track of bills happening at a state level, put pressure on local MPs, try to squash out white-nat movements overseas.
@TedTedwin It's at 2pm today apparently
@TedTedwin When actually is the speech?
@mitchyyyyy @AndrewLittleMP @grantrobertson1 Oh yeah I figured. I meant specifically about Trump's post-inauguration actions.
Relevant poem of the day. So much to be gained from trying to overcome borders :/ https://t.co/3zam8VfSE6
@grantrobertson1 Is @AndrewLittleMP going to release a statement on this?
@thomas_violence Chur, bro <3
Guys @Cjameskennedy made me a gingerbread recreation of the nazi being punched + @thomas_violence's tweet for my biâ€¦ https://t.co/rcgu8cwtdt
@madrunnerz Yeah, I'm very lucky. They were a bday gift from my bf. 3/4 flatmates in our flat have them now.
Flatmate's cat is very very excited by box my @Allbirds came in https://t.co/TbUmFZ608I
@StephanieMarija They....are? https://t.co/Xhx6UPgAnc
@SofaRobb It's funny because obviously SHE should be cleaning and HE should be putting his feet up and watching the game #equality
Actual quote from this article about #WomensMarchOnWashington : https://t.co/8oPYc5XCiT https://t.co/DvcTEzviJj
@RichardBSpencer Everyone saw you cry on tv, Richard.
@StephanieMarija @DebHarkness It's from this!! https://t.co/wgS7xonnHv
If you have photos from wellington #womensmarch consider submitting them to @guardian? They have nothing from New Zealand protests yet!
Much love and support to everyone going to #womenmarch today x https://t.co/NXjChuy1tA
@AlexFeinson @alexa_ruthless No I've heard that as well. I think crows might mourn as well?
Wellington is finally turning on the summer weather https://t.co/xUN3s7tdMp
@chennanigans Urgh I don't really know. I doubt anything will change his mind. @TedTedwin, ideas?
@chennanigans Did you comment anything?
@MrsGreatnews @Am_Em YES. I saw this a while ago, I think it really captures what's good about the song: https://t.co/OKiOyRcRSf
@MrsGreatnews It reminds me of this: https://t.co/KN5T7D1aHa
@MrsGreatnews I know?? I hate the trend of ~edgy~ male acoustic covers of female pop songs. Let it die already.
@samieywylie This is so perfectly timed. There's been a weird uptick in boob negativity in my corner of the internet recently >:(
@antheaw I like the focus on "cull things that make you feel like shit" instead of "turn yourself into a different person"
I know new year resolution-y listcles are pretty much always bullshit but I found one that I really really like: https://t.co/1EKE0UDtYy
@JJPalethorpe I heard someone label it #goldengate which is obviously the best version of that hashtag.
@JJPalethorpe That's comforting. Nearly 700 people thinking that's an ok opinion though D:
@Megapope @JJPalethorpe @farmgeek @MorganGodfery THIS is what gets me about fb comments like this. How many people are backing it up. Jfc??
@michellerennex know him?
@Fuller_Si YES. I was just recovering from dying Grandma and then it shot out.

Just saw Moana.
"Guess I picked the right tattoo" https://t.co/3FVCSW62jd
@gnomespeacock https://t.co/5CvoNBlKlA and another is in the notes of my original tweet somewhere
@badblackbarbie @ohyoufox He's pretty charismatic and convincing apparently. And broculist is SUCH a good word.
@GillettMickg90 @ohyoufox You probably do, especially if you went to Vic
@pinkdeedle I know right?? Apparently every one only realised through talkin to each other on IG and comparing timelines...
@ravenous_wolves Know him?
@_emc92 Gaslighting and emotional abuse :/
@pinkdeedle Yeah apparently he's hiding at at some girl's flat in Christchurch
@gnomespeacock Either through Salient (ex editor) or through like, like, five call out posts you would have seen circulating facebook.
@__catpower It's fucking crazy. There are three girls in my friend group alone, apparently more in Auckland and Dunedin.
@ladyhorrors @gtiso @rgay I keep seeing that around! Worth it?
Just fyi Welly girls, this guy has been cheating on his gf with tens of girls from around NZ so maybe swipe left... https://t.co/INWiTm4N3q
@MrsGreatnews Urgh and political posts that guilt people by saying shit like "90% of people won't share this, will you" uuurgh
@LOLGASMS Yup, used to be editor a couple of years ago I think?
@TedTedwin Obviously instead of a Chinese garden it should be another war memorial surrounded by rusty #8 wire.
@Megapope Blackcurrent is the devil's jam. Bought it accidentally once and almost cried.
@jason_aldous Yeah, racism aside, the dude who doesn't like *murals*...? What's up with that?
@__catpower Plus her racist ass co-opting Maori culture??
@__catpower NZ has a long history with China?? Chinese settlers have been here longer than A LOT of Pakeha??
@__catpower It wound me up so much. It would take so many tweets to outline all the reasons that comment is shitty.
@riamail I know right!
@GeorgeEGe Buy a tent and you can come live on our porch
@GeorgeEGe You're not going to be homeless because of immigrants George.
@GeorgeEGe Oh god can we not have this discourse. You can be Pro-Refugee and Pro-People-Wanting-To-Escape-A-Hellscape-Of-A-Country.
@SaigonSyl And the pacing of their confrontation in the hallway https://t.co/1yOgMfU5Pl
@SaigonSyl YES. That and Malcolm's arrest in the finale are my favourite scenes. The acting is just incredible??
@gtiso I remember this article!! Because there was also this hot mess https://t.co/YJaOwC7qJz
@alexiebond ...my brain has switched into "oh shit" mood
@alexiebond Yeah, I feel the same way. I felt like we were over the worst of it with the election and now with the inauguration coming up...
@alexiebond I know!! It's such an end of an era :/
@HaydenDonnell Try emailing Archives NZ? They're super helpful and might be able to point you in the direction of some resources?
@GerriKimber @KMSOCIETY Have you read his letters to her after they stopped living together? They stop me from feeling guilty!
@probabIyeating I definitely don't trust myself making meringue
@probabIyeating @Te_Papa My fav was the tiramisu/pavlova hybrid
Award for most wholesome internet thread goes to the people swapping lollycake recipes on @Te_Papa's fb page.
@immysophie Is this in Wellington??
@immysophie Yeah?! Were they American?
@immysophie Apparently it has a history of WS, with three soldiers from there killing an african american couple :/
@immysophie 'A' usually stands for aryan; apparently 5 can stand for "I have nothing to say" (the recommended response to police questions)?
@immysophie You've sent me into a wikipedia spiral now
@immysophie Oh god, yuck. What are the patches?
@Dovil "Although she would not go as far to apologise, she said she never intended to offend anyone." ...........
@Megapope I've seen this article a couple of times now, where is it from?
@BillHumphreyMA omg I love Heidi. Goat's milk, rustling pines, and fresh air = cure for every illness and disability apparently.
@jacobjakeybrown That's such an awesome idea!!
@sock_review So in love with the Rowdy 3
@sock_review Isn't it?? I'm the only person in my flat/friend-group who's watched it :(
@Megapope @JJPalethorpe You are a wiser human being than I, clearly
@MattWalshBlog @JJPalethorpe @Megapope From the guy who brought you "why be sad about 2016 when millions died during the plague"
@jacobjakeybrown Like Cassandra at the fall of Troy, we didn't listen until Kylie's prophecy until it was too late.
@Polychromantics oh god, what's she done now?
@JJPalethorpe Fuck people who invalidate people's feelings by finding THE ONE TRUE CAUSE FOR PEOPLE TO BE UPSET OVER.
@JJPalethorpe I read this like an hour ago and I'm still annoyed over it.
@seawall That's so sad. No wonder depression/suicide rates are so high in men...
